author: Xbox
description:
A title update will be released on Wednesday, April 16th!

Enjoy newly drawn artwork by CAPCOM artist Shinkiro, new remix tracks by CAPCOM's internal band "CAP-JAMS", and additional features and quality of life enhancements!

This collection spans across multiple titles starting with the first fighting game collaboration, X-MEN CHILDREN OF THE ATOM all the way to the legendary beat 'em up, THE PUNISHER!

All titles support online multiplayer so take this chance to get your hands on these classic games even if you didn't get to experience them at the arcades! 
 
Titles:
・X-MEN CHILDREN OF THE ATOM
・MARVEL SUPER HEROES
・X-MEN VS. STREET FIGHTER
・MARVEL SUPER HEROES vs. STREET FIGHTER
・MARVEL vs. CAPCOM CLASH OF SUPER HEROES
・MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 New Age of Heroes
・THE PUNISHER

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/marvel-vs-capcom-fighting-collection-arcade-classics/9nwfm3hdjc94

---------------
■Release Time: Digital and physical versions available now
■Number of players: 1-2 (online suppor
title: MARVEL vs. CAPCOM Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics - Title Update Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Forge your victory in our brand new permanent game mode, Stadium!

Strategy, teamwork, and hero evolution will determine who wins in Stadium as you and your team battle it out in this best-of-7, round-based mode.

In each round, players will be able to earn Stadium Cash that can be used to unlock powerful, game-changing abilities. Players can also take down high-value enemies marked with bounties to earn bonus Stadium Cash and turn the tide of battle.

See your hero’s upgraded abilities in action with the option to play in third-person or maintain the classic first-person perspective. The choice is yours!

Stadium also features its own standalone ranking system with season-exclusive rewards, encouraging players to master the mode and prove their competitive dominance.

Step into the arena when Season 16: Stadium launches on Apr 22.

Overwatch 2 is free to play for everyone on Xbox & PC!

https://www.xbox.com/games/overwatch-2

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX

title: Overwatch 2 | Stadium Gameplay Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Watch the trailer for Eternal Strands: Stargazer - the game's first free DLC - featuring a new Epic creature, new armor set, and new weapon designs developed with FINAL FANTASY XIV's visionary Yusuke Mogi! 

Available on Xbox Series X|S and with Xbox Game Pass on April 15, 2025.
